title: CSE AIML vs ECE at PES ?
content: 12th grader looking for admission in AY 2023, i have filled in my preferences as 1) CSE 2)CSE AIML 3)ECE what is the difference between AIML and CSE apart from the obvious ?

comments.body: All will be same in CSE and AIML, until 4th year, where AI-only subjects start for students. But yeah, it will be a good thing to do AI and ML, coz it will be same as doing both CSE and AIML.

\*3rd year. Your electives are in 3rd year, that is where in all likelihood the difference will be. Final year barely has courses lol. Besides, always a risk to take AIML without knowing for sure if you will be interested in it

Oh I see, thanks for correcting me.

Yes, I have chosen AI and ML out of sheer interest and passion, and not because I didn't have any choice. PES ring road AI and ML was my first option in kcet option entry. So I'm okay with it.

As someone who works in this field I'm really glad to hear that! No issues with people pursuing it as long as it's out of passion and not hype. Feel free to connect with me if you've got any questions about this field!
